description:
Socket an Artifact's [slot_trait] Trait Slot with this item to gain this trait:\n\nRound of Applause:
After an ally heals an enemy, the enemy is afflicted with {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_MANIA}. After an enemy with {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_MANIA} {ACTION_casts} a healing spell, this creature {ACTION_casts} [icons,1972]Words of Encouragement on them.
name: Briny Tux
